Metadata.title: Universalis Dierenzorg - Complete Animal Care
Metadata.description: Professional veterinary care for all animals including dogs, cats, birds, reptiles, and exotic pets in the Netherlands.

Hero.title: Complete Care for All Your Animals
Hero.subtitle: Professional veterinary services for dogs, cats, birds, reptiles, exotic pets, and all creatures great and small

general.title: General Consultations
general.description: Complete health check-ups and preventive care for all animal types

surgery.description: State-of-the-art surgical facilities for routine and complex procedures

dental.title: Dental Care
dental.description: Professional dental cleaning, extractions, and oral health maintenance

vaccination.title: Vaccinations
vaccination.description: Complete vaccination programs tailored to each species and lifestyle

exotic.title: Exotic Animal Care
exotic.description: Specialized care for reptiles, amphibians, birds, and exotic mammals

emergency.title: Emergency Care
emergency.description: 24/7 emergency services for urgent medical situations

About.title: About Universalis Dierenzorg
About.subtitle: Caring for all creatures since 2010
About.description: Located in the heart of the Netherlands, Universalis Dierenzorg is a full-service veterinary clinic dedicated to providing exceptional care for all animals. Our team of experienced veterinarians specializes in treating dogs, cats, birds, reptiles, small mammals, and exotic pets.
About.mission: Our mission is to deliver compassionate, high-quality veterinary care while educating pet owners about animal health and wellness.

Contact.title: Contact Us
Contact.subtitle: We're here to help with all your animal care needs
